Package sagex.phoenix.vfs.filters

    Interface Description
    IResourceFilter  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractResourceFilterContainer
    Simple container for Filters
    AlbumStartsWithFilter  
    AndResourceFilter
    Only returns true if ALL filters accept the resource
    ArtistStartsWithFilter  
    BaseRegexFilter
    Base filter that accepts a regular expression as the filter value.
    BDFilter  
    ChannelFilter  
    CurrentlyRecordingFilter  
    DateFilter  
    DontLikeFilter  
    DVDFilter  
    EpisodeTitleStartsWithFilter  
    FavoriteFilter  
    FileExtFilter
    filters a file extension using a regular expression
    FileNameFilter
    Filters a filename by regular expression
    FilePathFilter
    filters a file path using a regular expression
    Filter
    Filters are used to restrict a view based on a criteria.
    FilterFactory  
    FirstRunFilter  
    GenresFilter  
    GenreStartsWithFilter  
    GlobalExcludeFilter
    will only accept a file, if it has not been excluded
    HDFilter  
    HomeVideosConfiguration  
    HomeVideosFilter
    Returns true if the file is a considered to be a Home Video.
    ManualRecordingFilter  
    MediaResourceTypeFilter
    Filters media based on the Types listed in the MediaResourceType class

    the value can either be number of a string, ie, "1" or "FILE", or "file", or "File".
    MediaTypeFilter
    Filters media based on the Types listed in the MediaResourceType class

    the value can either be number of a string, ie, "1" or "FILE", or "file", or "File".
    MetadataFieldFilter
    Filters based on the value of a metadata field
    MissingFanartFilter  
    MissingMetadataFilter
    Filter returns true if the IMediaFile is missing core metadata fields.
    MissingTVFilter  
    OrResourceFilter
    returns true if Any filters accept the resource
    PartiallyWatchedFilter
    A filter for files that the user has started to watch, but has not finished.
    PQLFilter
    Filters based on a PQL Expression, ie, "SeasonNumber > 4 and EpisodeNumber = 3", etc
    RatingsFilter  
    RecentlyWatchedFilter
    A filter for files that were watch within the last configurable interval (one day, by default)
    ReRunFilter  
    TitleFilter  
    TitleStartsWithFilter  
    UserCategoryFilter  
    WatchedFilter  
    WrappedResourceFilter
    Wraps a standard IResourceFilter to make it compatible with a View Filter
